abstract: An inexpensive new video tool lets you shoot a moving 360-degree panorama using the iPhone.
snippet: An inexpensive new video tool lets you shoot a moving 360-degree panorama using the iPhone.
lead_paragraph: Video in 3-D may be all the rage, but there is an inexpensive new video tool that I think has greater potential to change the way you shoot video.

headline.main: A Videocamera That Captures 360 Degrees of Action
